attributes.title: i hate this app
attributes.review: i was trying to just look at this app and all of a sudden my phone got hacked😖 also i've heard about trump baning an app called "tik tok" i don't agree on this😡 don't take away my child's life😭 while i'm at it, u built like the cheeto puff that i found under my bed from 2 years ago💋

attributes.title: Super bad app
attributes.review: This app is so terrible and takes long to download. No everyone votes for trump and he is a bad president. He is not capable of anything. Worst app i ever came across!!

attributes.title: The worst app
attributes.review: This is the worstttt apppp I found on my apppp store I think you should delete this why bc it’s already getting bad reviews delete pleaseeee!!!!😤👿

attributes.title: Orange mystery
attributes.review: I came here to support our wonderful president until I downloaded the app and it glitched so hard my entire screen became trumps face... ORANGE! I hate the color orange!!!! (Gen Z for the win🧚‍♀️✨)

attributes.title: Basically Not Functional
attributes.review: This app functions like it was designed by a drunk toddler. And the UX has all the charm of our commander in chief (that is to say: none).

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Horrible app....not so good. You could say they are many other bad apps, but this one is the worst. It should be removed. It’s not good, nada. Remove it from the App Store. Orange man bad.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch to the point where i had to buy a new one. i DO NOT support this app 😡😡😡

attributes.title: WORST APP POSSIBLE
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, my body levitated off the ground and I passed out, now I’m floating around the world and I can’t stop, but I did pass this very weird orange colored man, 😹✨👑🧚🏻‍♀️😁♥️

attributes.userName: Donald Trump can eat my butt
attributes.title: The Worst App Ever
attributes.review: When I downloaded the app, I was reminded of the face of..🤢, Donald Trump. When I thought of this, I puked and I got so disgusted that I had to break my phone. Thanks Donald Trump. Ha, more like Donald Dump, am I right?

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: this app made my phone SO slow. 10/10 would NOT recommend. #anyonebuttrump2020
